full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DON 'GANGS CHE BA 'GA' ZHIG DPYOD PA LA NYE BAR MKHO BA 'THAD LDAN GSAL BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
